manifest_description.message: Adjust zoom and get instant feedback about zoom level

manifest_command_preset.message: Zoom to a value set on the extension settings page
manifest_command_preset.description: Manifest JSON preset value command string

notification_install_body.message: Please, take a look at the Settings!

notification_update_body.message: Please, take a look at the Settings to find out what's new!

settings_content_shortcut_popup.message: Alt+Shift+Z is the default shortcut to open the toolbar popup. (Esc is the default shortcut to close it.)

settings_content_shortcut_preset.message: Alt+Shift+T is the default shortcut to zoom to the custom value.

settings_content_incognito_info.message: If you want to use this extension in private mode, you have to activate in manualy in the Extension manager.

settings_content_zoom_info.message: You can set the default zoom level of the browser in Settings -> Websites -> Display.

settings_content_howToUse_builtIn.message: You can use any method to zoom the page. You will see the zoom value on the button.

settings_content_howToUse_keyboard.message: When the popup is open, you can also use the left/down arrows to zoom out and the right/up arrows to zoom in.

settings_content_howToUse_mouse.message: When the popup is open, you can also use your mouse to move the slider, or scroll with the wheel over the popup.

settings_content_howToUse_default.message: You can use the context menu of the toolbar button to reset zoom to default.

settings_content_notes_doesNotWork.message: This extension can not change the zoom level on the internal browser pages and the Opera addon catalog. This is an Opera policy.

settings_content_notes_performance.message: The browser may not be able to zoom the page as quickly as you change the zoom on the slider. It depends on your available hardware resources.

settings_content_permissions_contextMenu.message: "contextMenus" to customize the toolbar button menu.

settings_content_permissions_notificatio.message: "notifications" to use notifications to inform you about updates.

settings_content_credits_thanks.message: Thanks for every contributor! (See the changelog for details!)

settings_content_warning_notResponsible.message: This extension was not made by Opera Software ASA. The company is not responsible for any of the errors.

settings_content_license_share.message: You can only share this extension for free.

settings_content_license_copy.message: You can use the source code with the proper reference to the original author.

settings_content_donate_text.message: This extension is completely free to use. However, if you want to contribute with a small amount of money, you can click on the image below to donate via PayPal. (You can use either a PayPal account or a credit card.)
